title: Fast GPS based photo inspections for houses -  Report builder Mobile App
desc: We would like to be able to edit the template of multi able choice questions as our needs change in the future. The end user should not be able to edit the template (just the super user or owner of the app).This mobile app will not be publicly available.When a user arrives at the first house on the inspection they should start the new app and take a picture of the exterior of the house, save the picture and start the home inspection report. The app should use the GPS location of the device  and suggest possible valid address for this house that the user may select from in a menu with one click and no scrolling,  then it will be added to the report. It should also allow the user to manually type in an address on the rare occasion that none of the suggested locations are not satisfactory.Now there will be some multi able choice questions."Is house vacant" Yes - No - Not sureif yes ask "take picture of power meter" picture of power meter must be added to report with GPS provided full address (not GPS coordinates) information. (address not changeable by user)If yes ask "lock box installed on any door?" Yes - NoIf yes ask "take picture of lock box" picture of lock box must be added to report with GPS provided full address (not GPS coordinates) information. (address not changeable by user)"Is house securely locked" Yes - No - comment ____________"Interior access?"  Yes - NoIf yes ask "Last 3 Digits of Key Code?" ___If yes "take pictures of every room" pictures of every must be added to report with GPS provided full address (not GPS coordinates) information. (address not changeable by user)If yes ""Condition of kitchen on a scale of 1-10?" ___"Condition of bathroom 1 on a scale of 1-10?" ___"Condition of bathrrom 2 on a scale of 1-10?" ___ - n/a"Condition of bathroom 3 on a scale of 1-10?" ___ - n/a"is copper intact?" Yes - No"is electric wiring intact?" Yes - No"is roof leaking?" Yes - No"is there an extreme amount of mold?" Yes - Noif yes " what room(s) is/are the mold located?" ______"Basement?" Yes - No"Condition of roof on a scale of 1-10?" ___"Condition of siding on a scale of 1-10?" ___"Condition of windows on a scale of 1-10?" ___"Condition of foundation on a scale of 1-10?" ___"Boarded house next to or across the street?  Yes - No"Number of cars in driveway?" ___"Tall Grass" Yes - No

title: Android POS application print function
desc: We have built an android POS application and at a stage where we need to print recipes from our newly developed POS application.The POS application will be installed on a POS terminal we have developed in-house. Its an all in one terminal with a 7" tablet/Android 5.0 OS and an OTG USB Thermal 50mm printher. We have installed a universal USB OTG printer driver on the device and have successfully printed a couple of test pages to confirm the communications status between the Tablet and the Thermal printer over OTG.Now we need to install some code to our "Print" buttons in the application to execute the print job and send it to the printer to be printed.So my URGENT request is for some to assist me to code and integrate the code into the Print Buttons function as an action to work and set up the slip layout.The Successful end result should be when I can print a transaction ticket from my POS terminal via my POS application. simple!PLEASE NOTE: My project is due to be delivered tomorrow and I need some urgent to assist me tonight to get this application to print slips, please.Kind Regards , Peter

title: Help us create a photo app (I've updated the links)
desc: I am a construction project manager and my partner is a web-developer. We are based in Munich Germany and are in need of your support for this project.We are in need of somebody or a team that can develop an photo management and archiving app that works on Android & Apple Smartphones and Tabletts. It is called PICTOCOM.We will handle design, but you will have to program it.WHAT THE APP IS ABOUT:The construction site manager takes a lot of photos of the houses and work during the construction process because he has to document everything. It is a lot of work to export those pictures, rename them and organize them. That is why we wanted to create an app that does that for you. By selecting what you are going to take a picture of, the construction manager doesn't need to organize the photos afterwards. As they will already be in the correct folder and they will be exported to an server.PICTOCOM requirements:1.	Server and Online Web-App:2.	Web server: Apache or Windows Server 20163.	Database: Mysql4.	For Frontend and Backend interface work with PHP 75.	XML construction for the structure6.	Mobile Frontend Feature:7.	User Login and Logout Feature8.	Admin and User roles9.	Camera Interface10.	Temporary local save photo data on the Mobil phone11.	Automatic creation of folder structure from Admin and User account12.	Uploading from temporary photo- and file data13.	Uploading files comes to the Online Server14.	Frontend Multi-Language option15.	Multi-Language file for all words (EN-file, DE-file, NL-file…..)16.	Platform independent for all Mobile devices17.   Webbased interface will be needed for us as Superadmins and for the   Users to organize/manage their pictures.MOCK-UP:We have developed a Mock-Up which you can visit through this link,  the buttons are clickable!Admin Walkthrough (Admin can create Alpha user groups and invite Alpha users):[url removed, login to view]Alpha user Walkthrough (Alpha can create a Folder structure, invite Beta user and make/archive pictures):[url removed, login to view]Beta user Walkthrough (can make/archive pictures and view taken pictures):[url removed, login to view]TELL US SOMETHING ABOUT YOURSELF:We would like to get to know you before we do business with you.1) What is your specialty, in what do you specifically stand out?2) Can you give us 2 – 3 examples of projects that you finished the past 6 months? What was your biggest project, what are you most proud of? (please enclose links)3) Tell us about you/your team. sell yourself! :)PRICEPlease give us your price estimation and time estimation.Please tell us how many people will work on the app and what their specialty is (i.e. developer, project manager, etc.)We are looking for a reliable developer whom could also help us in future endeavors. We prefer a fixed price.
